control_attributes.Control: SA-12 (7) ASSESSMENTS PRIOR TO SELECTION / ACCEPTANCE / UPDATE
control_attributes.control_description: The organization conducts an assessment of the information system, system component, or information system service prior to selection, acceptance, or update.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization establishes and retains unique identification of [Assignment: organization-defined supply chain elements, processes, and actors] for the information system, system component, or information system service.

Control Statement: The organization conducts an assessment of the information system, system component, or information system service prior to selection, acceptance, or update.
Control Name: SA-12 (7) ASSESSMENTS PRIOR TO SELECTION / ACCEPTANCE / UPDATE
